original: des skye mched drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des skye mched drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not dwell on the six sense sources.

original: des reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not dwell on contact.

original: des tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not dwell on sensation.

original: des sred pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des sred pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not dwell on craving.

original: des len pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des len pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not dwell on appropriation.

original: des srid pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des srid pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not dwell on existence.

original: des skye ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des skye ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not dwell on birth.

original: des rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not dwell on aging and death.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ni / 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ni / 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste /
translated: Blessed One,🔽it is because form is empty of form.🔽The emptiness of form is not form.

original: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs ma lags /🔽gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs ma lags / gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is not other than form,🔽and form is not other than emptiness.

original: gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Form itself is emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so //🔽tshor ba tshor bas stong ste /🔽tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba ma lags /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so // tshor ba tshor bas stong ste / tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba ma lags /
translated: and emptiness itself is form.🔽Sensation is empty of sensation.🔽The emptiness of sensation is not sensation.

original: tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is not other than sensation,🔽and sensation is not other than emptiness.

original: tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Feelings are also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o //🔽'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ste; 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes ma lags /🔽'du shes las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o // 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ste; 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes ma lags / 'du shes las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is also feelings.🔽Perceptions are empty of perceptions.🔽Emptiness is not other than perceptions,

original: 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: and perceptions are also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so //
translated: Emptiness is also perceptions.

original: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste /🔽'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed ma lags /🔽'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste / 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed ma lags / 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Formations are empty of formations.🔽Emptiness is not other than formations,

original: 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa @508b nyid; stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do //🔽rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste /🔽rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma lags /
analyzed: 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa @508b nyid; stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do // rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma lags /
translated: and formations are also emptiness.🔽Consciousness is empty of consciousness.🔽Emptiness is not other than consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: and consciousness is also emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i tshe /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings stand in the perfection of wisdom,

original: des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o //🔽des tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o // des tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not stand in form.🔽They should not stand in feeling.

original: des 'du shes la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des 'du shes la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not stand in perception.

original: des 'du byed la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des 'du byed la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not stand in volitional factors.

original: des rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not stand in consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de'ang 'di ltar mig mig gis stong ste /🔽mig gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig ma lags /
analyzed: de'ang 'di ltar mig mig gis stong ste / mig gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig ma lags /
translated: the eye is empty of the eye.🔽The emptiness of the eye is not the eye.

original: mig las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: mig las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the eye,🔽and the eye is not other than emptiness.🔽The eye itself is emptiness;

original: stong pa nyid kyang mig go /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mig go /
translated: emptiness itself is the eye.

original: rna ba rna bas stong ste /
analyzed: rna ba rna bas stong ste /
translated: The ear is empty of the ear.

original: rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rna ba ma lags; rna ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rna ba ma lags; rna ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: and emptiness is not other than the ears.

original: rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The ears themselves are emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o //🔽sna snas stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o // sna snas stong ste /
translated: and emptiness itself is the ears.🔽The nose is empty of the nose.

original: sna'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sna ma lags /
analyzed: sna'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sna ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the nose is not the nose,

original: sna las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sna las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: and emptiness is not other than the nose.🔽The nose itself is emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang sna'o //🔽lce lces stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sna'o // lce lces stong ste /
translated: and emptiness itself is the nose.🔽The tongue is empty of the tongue.

original: lce'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lce ma lags /
analyzed: lce'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lce ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the tongue is not the tongue,

original: lce las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma @509a *//🔽mchis te / lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lce las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma @509a *// mchis te / lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: and emptiness is not other than the tongue.🔽The tongue itself is emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang lce'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lce'o //
translated: and emptiness itself is the tongue.

original: lus lus kyis stong ste /🔽lus kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lus ma lags /
analyzed: lus lus kyis stong ste / lus kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lus ma lags /
translated: The body is empty of the body.🔽The emptiness of the body is not the body,

original: lus las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: lus las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: and emptiness is not other than the body.

original: lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The body itself is emptiness,🔽and emptiness itself is the body.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lus so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lus so //
translated: Emptiness is also the body.

original: yid yid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: yid yid kyis stong ste /
translated: The mind is empty of mind.🔽The emptiness of the mind is not the mind.

original: yid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid ma lag; yid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: yid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid ma lag; yid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the mind.🔽The mind itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yid do //
translated: Emptiness itself is the mind.

original: gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste /🔽gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs ma lags /
analyzed: gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste / gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs ma lags /
translated: Form is empty of form.🔽The emptiness of form is not form.

original: gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than form.🔽Form itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so //🔽sgra sgras stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so // sgra sgras stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is form.🔽Sound is empty of sound.

original: sgra'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sgra ma lags /
analyzed: sgra'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sgra ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of sound is not sound.

original: sgra las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sgra las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than sound.🔽Sound itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o //🔽dri dris stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o // dri dris stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is sound.🔽Smell is empty of smell.

original: dri'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang dri ma lags /
analyzed: dri'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang dri ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of smell is not smell.

original: dri las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: dri las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: emptiness does not exist apart from smell.🔽Smell itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dri'o //🔽ro ros stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dri'o // ro ros stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is smell.🔽Taste is empty of taste.

original: ro'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang ro ma lags /
analyzed: ro'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang ro ma lags /
translated: That emptiness of taste is not taste.

original: ro las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: ro las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness does not exist apart from taste.🔽Taste itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ro'o //🔽reg reg gis stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ro'o // reg reg gis stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is taste.🔽Touch is empty of touch.

original: reg gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang reg ma lags /
analyzed: reg gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang reg ma lags /
translated: That emptiness of touch is not touch.

original: reg las gud na'ang stong pa @509b nyid ma mchis te /🔽reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: reg las gud na'ang stong pa @509b nyid ma mchis te / reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness does not exist apart from touch.🔽Touch itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang reg go /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang reg go /
translated: Emptiness itself is touch.

original: chos chos kyis stong ste /
analyzed: chos chos kyis stong ste /
translated: Mental phenomena are empty of mental phenomena.

original: chos kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chos ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chos ma lags /
translated: That emptiness of mental phenomena is not mental phenomena.

original: chos las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: chos las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness does not exist apart from mental phenomena.🔽Mental phenomena themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chos so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chos so //
translated: Emptiness itself is mental phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste /
translated: Eye consciousness is empty of eye consciousness.🔽The emptiness of eye consciousness is not eye consciousness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa ma lags /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa ma lags /
translated: Emptiness is not other than eye consciousness,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: and eye consciousness is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste /
translated: Eye consciousness itself is emptiness; emptiness itself is eye consciousness.🔽Ear consciousness is empty of ear consciousness.🔽The emptiness of ear consciousness is not ear consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma lags /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma lags /
translated: Emptiness is not other than ear consciousness,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: and ear consciousness is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Ear consciousness itself is emptiness; emptiness itself is ear consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa ma lags /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa ma lags /
translated: olfactory consciousness is empty of olfactory consciousness.🔽The emptiness of olfactory consciousness is not olfactory consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is not other than olfactory consciousness,🔽and olfactory consciousness is not other than emptiness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Olfactory consciousness itself is emptiness;

original: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //🔽lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o // lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste /
translated: emptiness itself is olfactory consciousness.🔽gustatory consciousness is empty of gustatory consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags @510a *//🔽pa de'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa ma lags /🔽lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags @510a *// pa de'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa ma lags / lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: The emptiness of gustatory consciousness is not gustatory consciousness.🔽Emptiness is not other than gustatory consciousness,🔽and gustatory consciousness is not other than emptiness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Gustatory consciousness itself is emptiness;

original: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: emptiness itself is gustatory consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste /
translated: bodily consciousness is empty of bodily consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the consciousness of the body is not the consciousness of the body.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the consciousness of the body, there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o;/
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o;/
translated: The consciousness of the body is emptiness and emptiness is the consciousness of the body.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste /
translated: The mental consciousness is empty of the mental consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the mental consciousness is not the mental consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the mental consciousness, there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The mental consciousness is emptiness and emptiness is the mental consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
translated: Eye contact is empty of eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the composite of eye contact is not the composite of eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te; mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /🔽stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te; mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid / stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
translated: Apart from the composite of eye contact, there is no emptiness. The composite of eye contact is emptiness and emptiness is the composite of eye contact.🔽The composite of ear contact is empty of the composite of ear contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa @510b nyid gang lags pa de'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa @510b nyid gang lags pa de'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the composite of ear contact is not the composite of ear contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the composite of ear contact, there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: The composite of ear contact is emptiness and emptiness is the composite of ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
translated: The composite of nose contact is empty of the composite of nose contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the union of nose and contact is not the union of nose and contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the union of nose and contact, there is no emptiness.🔽The union of nose and contact is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o // lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
translated: Emptiness is the union of nose and contact.🔽“The union of tongue and contact is empty of the union of tongue and contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the union of tongue and contact is not the union of tongue and contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the union of tongue and contact, there is no emptiness.🔽The union of tongue and contact is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
translated: Emptiness is the union of tongue and contact.🔽“The union of body and contact is empty of the union of body and contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the union of body and contact is not the union of body and contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: emptiness does not exist apart from the composite of contact at the sense of touch.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The composite of contact at the sense of touch itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is the composite of contact at the sense of touch.🔽The composite of contact at the mind is empty of the composite of contact at the mind.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gung @511a *//
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gung @511a *//
translated: The emptiness of the composite of contact at the mind is not the composite of contact at the mind.

original: na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness does not exist apart from the composite of contact at the mind.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The composite of contact at the mind itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the composite of contact at the mind.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact at the eye is empty of the feeling that arises from the condition of the composite of contact at the eye.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of eye is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of eye.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of eye, there is no emptiness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of eye is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /
translated: Emptiness is the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of eye.🔽“The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of ear is empty of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of ear.🔽The emptiness of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of ear is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of ear.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of ear, there is no emptiness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The condition of contact through the union of ear and sound is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: Emptiness is also the condition of contact through the union of ear and sound.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
translated: The condition of contact through the union of nose and smell is empty of the condition of contact through the union of nose and smell.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the condition of contact through the union of nose and smell is not the condition of contact through the union of nose and smell.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba @511b las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba @511b las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the condition of contact through the union of nose and smell.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The condition of contact through the union of nose and smell is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: Emptiness is also the condition of contact through the union of nose and smell.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
translated: The condition of contact through the union of tongue and taste is empty of the condition of contact through the union of tongue and taste.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: The emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the contact of the tongue is not the condition of feeling that arises from the contact of the tongue.🔽Apart from the condition of feeling that arises from the contact of the tongue, there is no emptiness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The condition of feeling that arises from the contact of the tongue is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /
translated: Emptiness is the condition of feeling that arises from the contact of the tongue.🔽“The condition of feeling that arises from the contact of the body is empty of the condition of feeling that arises from the contact of the body.🔽The emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the contact of the body is not the condition of feeling that arises from the contact of the body.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the condition of feeling that arises from the contact of the body, there is no emptiness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The condition of contact by means of the body is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: Emptiness is also the condition of contact by means of the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
translated: The condition of contact by means of the mind is empty of the condition of contact by means of the mind.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud @512a *//
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud @512a *//
translated: The emptiness of the condition of contact by means of the mind is not the condition of contact by means of the mind.

original: na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the condition of contact by means of the mind.🔽The condition of contact by means of the mind is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: Emptiness is also the condition of contact by means of the mind.

original: sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong ste /
translated: The earth element is empty of the earth element.

original: sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sa'i khams ma lags /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sa'i khams ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the earth element is not the earth element.

original: sa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the earth element.🔽The earth element itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so //🔽chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so // chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is the earth element.🔽The water element is empty of the water element.

original: chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chu'i khams ma lags /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chu'i khams ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the water element is not the water element.

original: chu'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: chu'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the water element.🔽The water element itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so //🔽me'i khams me'i khams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so // me'i khams me'i khams kyis stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is the water element.🔽The fire element is empty of the fire element.

original: me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang me'i khams ma lags /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang me'i khams ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the fire element is not the fire element.

original: me'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: me'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the fire element.🔽The fire element itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so //
translated: Emptiness itself is the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong ste; rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rlung gi khams ma lags /🔽rlung gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong ste; rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rlung gi khams ma lags / rlung gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: The wind element is empty of the wind element.🔽The emptiness of the wind element is not the wind element.

original: rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the wind element,

original: stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so //
translated: and the wind element is not other than emptiness.

original: nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste /🔽nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang nam mkha'i khams ma lags /🔽nam mkha'i @512b khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste / nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang nam mkha'i khams ma lags / nam mkha'i @512b khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: The space element is empty of the space element.🔽The emptiness of the space element is not the space element.

original: nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the space element,

original: stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so //
translated: and the space element is not other than emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste /
translated: The consciousness element is empty of the consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the consciousness element is not the consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the consciousness element.🔽The consciousness element itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
translated: Emptiness itself is the consciousness element.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ste /🔽ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang ma rig pa ma lags /
analyzed: ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ste / ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang ma rig pa ma lags /
translated: ignorance is empty of ignorance.🔽The emptiness of ignorance is not ignorance.

original: ma rig pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: ma rig pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than ignorance.🔽Ignorance itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is ignorance.

original: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste /🔽'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed ma lags /
analyzed: 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste / 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed ma lags /
translated: Formations are empty of formations.🔽The emptiness of formations is not formations.

original: 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is not other than formations.

original: 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Formations themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do //🔽rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do // rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste /
translated: emptiness is also conditioned.🔽Consciousness is empty of consciousness.🔽The emptiness of consciousness is not consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma lags /
translated: Emptiness is not other than consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: and consciousness is not other than emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Consciousness itself is emptiness;

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //🔽ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyis stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o // ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyis stong ste /
translated: emptiness itself is consciousness.🔽Name and form are empty of name and form.🔽The emptiness of name and form is not name and form.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang ming dang gzugs ma lags /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang ming dang gzugs ma lags /
translated: Emptiness is not other than name and form,

original: @513a *// ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: @513a *// ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: and name and form are not other than emptiness.🔽Name and form themselves are emptiness;

original: ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so //
translated: emptiness itself is name and form.

original: skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong ste /
analyzed: skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong ste /
translated: The six sense sources are empty of the six sense sources.

original: skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang skye mched drug ma lags /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang skye mched drug ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the six sense sources is not the six sense sources.

original: skye mched drug las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid; stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go /
analyzed: skye mched drug las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid; stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the six sense sources.

original: reg pa reg pas stong ste /
analyzed: reg pa reg pas stong ste /
translated: The six sense sources themselves are emptiness, and emptiness itself is the six sense sources.🔽“Contact is empty of contact.

original: reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang reg pa ma lags /
analyzed: reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang reg pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of contact is not contact.

original: reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is not other than contact.

original: reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o //
translated: Contact itself is emptiness, and emptiness itself is contact.

original: tshor ba tshor bas stong ste /
analyzed: tshor ba tshor bas stong ste /
translated: “Sensation is empty of sensation.

original: tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba ma lags /
analyzed: tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of sensation is not sensation.

original: tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te; tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
analyzed: tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te; tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
translated: Emptiness is not other than sensation. Sensation itself is emptiness, and emptiness itself is sensation.

original: sred pa sred pas stong ste /
analyzed: sred pa sred pas stong ste /
translated: “Craving is empty of craving.

original: sred pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sred pa ma lags /
analyzed: sred pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sred pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of craving is not craving.

original: sred pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sred pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than craving.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o //
translated: Craving is emptiness, and emptiness is craving.

original: len pa len pas stong ste /
analyzed: len pa len pas stong ste /
translated: “ ‘Grasping is empty of grasping.

original: len pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang len pa ma lags /
analyzed: len pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang len pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of grasping is not grasping.

original: len pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: len pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is not other than grasping.

original: len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o //
analyzed: len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o //
translated: Grasping is emptiness, and emptiness is grasping.

original: srid pa srid pas stong ste /🔽srid pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang srid pa ma lags /
analyzed: srid pa srid pas stong ste / srid pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang srid pa ma lags /
translated: ‘“Becoming is empty of becoming.🔽The emptiness of becoming is not becoming.

original: srid pa @513b las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: srid pa @513b las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than becoming.

original: stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o //🔽skye ba skye bas stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o // skye ba skye bas stong ste /
translated: Becoming is emptiness, and emptiness is becoming.🔽‘“Birth is empty of birth.

original: skye ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang skye ba ma lags /
analyzed: skye ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang skye ba ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of birth is not birth.

original: skye ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: skye ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: emptiness is not other than arising.

original: skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o //
analyzed: skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o //
translated: Arising is emptiness, emptiness is arising.

original: rga shi rga shis stong ste /
analyzed: rga shi rga shis stong ste /
translated: Old age and death are empty of old age and death.

original: rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rga shi ma lags /
analyzed: rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rga shi ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of old age and death is not old age and death.

original: rga shi las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rga shi las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than old age and death.🔽Old age and death are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o //
translated: Emptiness is old age and death.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for this reason

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom

original: ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not dwell on ignorance,

original: 'du byed la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'du byed la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not dwell on volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not dwell on consciousness,

original: ming dang gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not dwell on name and form,

original: skye mched drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: skye mched drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not dwell on the six sense sources,

original: reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not dwell on contact,

original: tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not abide in feeling.

original: sreg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //🔽len pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: sreg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o // len pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not abide in heat.🔽They should not abide in appropriation.

original: srid pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: srid pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not abide in existence.

original: skye ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: skye ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not abide in birth.

original: rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not abide in aging and death.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: further, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste / de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: they should not abide in the perfection of generosity.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ni / 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu @514a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ni / 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu @514a *//
translated: If you ask why, Blessed One,

original: phyin pas stong ste /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
analyzed: phyin pas stong ste / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
translated: it is because the perfection of generosity is empty of the perfection of generosity.🔽The emptiness of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of generosity.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the perfection of generosity,🔽and the perfection of generosity is not other than emptiness.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity itself is emptiness, and emptiness is the perfection of generosity.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Furthermore, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: they should not abide in the perfection of discipline.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ni / 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ni / 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
translated: Blessed One,🔽it is because the perfection of discipline is empty of the perfection of discipline.🔽The emptiness of the perfection of discipline is not the perfection of discipline.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the perfection of discipline,🔽and the perfection of discipline is not other than emptiness.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality itself is the emptiness of emptiness, and the emptiness of emptiness is the perfection of morality.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Furthermore, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: they should not abide in the perfection of patience.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni / 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang @514b bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang @514b bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
translated: it is because the perfection of patience is empty of the perfection of patience.🔽The emptiness of the perfection of patience is not the perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the perfection of patience,🔽and the perfection of patience is not other than emptiness.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience itself is also the emptiness of emptiness, and the emptiness of emptiness is also the perfection of patience.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Furthermore, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: they should not abide in the perfection of diligence.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ni / 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ni / 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
translated: Blessed One,🔽it is because the perfection of diligence is empty of the perfection of diligence.🔽The emptiness of the perfection of diligence is not the perfection of diligence.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the perfection of diligence,🔽and the perfection of diligence is not other than emptiness.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bcom ldan 'das / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: The perfection of perseverance is the emptiness of emptiness.🔽The emptiness of emptiness is the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste / de ci'i slad du zhe na / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The perfection of concentration is empty of the perfection of concentration.🔽The emptiness of emptiness is the perfection of concentration.🔽The perfection of concentration is the emptiness of emptiness.

original: de ni / 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is the perfection of concentration.🔽The perfection of wisdom is empty of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las @515a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las @515a *//
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is the emptiness of emptiness.🔽The emptiness of emptiness is the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of generosity is empty of the perfection of generosity.

original: gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is the perfection of generosity.🔽The perfection of generosity is the emptiness of emptiness.🔽The emptiness of emptiness is the perfection of generosity.🔽The perfection of morality is empty of the perfection of morality.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditative stability is emptiness, and emptiness is the perfection of meditative stability.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Furthermore, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste / de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: they should not stand in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
translated: If you ask why, Blessed One,🔽it is because the perfection of wisdom is empty of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The emptiness of the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the perfection of wisdom,🔽and the perfection of wisdom is not other than emptiness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom itself is the emptiness of emptiness, and the emptiness of emptiness is the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for this reason

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not rest in the six perfections.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: further, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: they should not rest in the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni / 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste /
translated: it is because the four establishments of mindfulness are empty of the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa @515b rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags /🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa @515b rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /

analyzed: rnam grangs des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems @519a *//

analyzed: dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not abide in the formless absorptions.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste; de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste; de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not abide in the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation. If you ask why, Blessed One, it is because emptiness is not one thing, and the emptiness gateway to liberation another, and so on up to: aspirationlessness is not one thing, and the aspirationlessness gateway to liberation another.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni / 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa /
translated: It is thus: the emptiness gate of liberation,🔽the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ste /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ste /

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma lags /
translated: That emptiness of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation is not the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation, there is no emptiness.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are emptiness.

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of signlessness, and the emptiness of wishlessness are gateways to liberation.

original: bcom ldan 'das; rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das; rnam grangs des na /

translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not abide in the emptiness of liberation, the emptiness of signlessness, or the emptiness of wishlessness.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste /
translated: it is because the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the unshared qualities of the Buddha is not the unshared qualities of the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the unshared qualities of the Buddha, emptiness does not exist.🔽The unshared qualities of the Buddha are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so //
translated: Emptiness is the unshared qualities of the Buddha.

original: bcom ldan @521a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan @521a *//
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'das / rnam grangs des na /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not dwell on the unshared qualities of the Buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste; yi ge mngon par sgrub pa la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste; yi ge mngon par sgrub pa la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: Moreover, Blessed One, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not dwell on letters, and they should not dwell on the accomplishment of letters.

analyzed: gcig tu brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi /

analyzed: gnyis su brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: yi ge rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / yi ge rnams kyang stong pa nyid /

translated: “Moreover, Lord, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in the letters.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid do //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: rnam grangs des na /

translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not dwell on the notion that form is impermanent.

analyzed: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /

original: stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid do //

analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for this reason

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //

analyzed: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du shes mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /

analyzed: 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid ma lags /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid do //

analyzed: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not abide in the notion that compositional factors are impermanent.

analyzed: 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid ma lags /

analyzed: 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the impermanence of compounded phenomena, there is no emptiness.🔽The impermanence of compounded phenomena is empty.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid do //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
