analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar 'du byed bdag med pa nyid 'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: it is because the selflessness of formations is empty of the selflessness of formations.

original: 'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed bdag med pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: 'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed bdag med pa nyid ma lags /
translated: That emptiness of the selflessness of compositional activity is not the selflessness of compositional activity.

original: 'du byed bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: 'du byed bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: Apart from the selflessness of compositional activity, there is no emptiness.

original: 'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid; stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed bdag med pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid; stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed bdag med pa nyid do //
translated: The selflessness of compositional activity is emptiness, and emptiness is the selflessness of compositional activity.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for that reason

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not abide in the notion that ‘compositional activity is selfless.’

original: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste; de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste; de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not abide in the notion that ‘consciousness is selfless.’ And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: It is thus that the no-self of consciousness is empty of the no-self of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the no-self of consciousness is not the no-self of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the no-self of consciousness, emptiness does not exist.🔽The no-self of consciousness is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the no-self of consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /

translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not stand in ‘consciousness is not a self.’

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for that reason

translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not stand in ‘form is calm.’

translated: “When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not stand in the notion ‘feeling is empty.’

original: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not stand in the notion ‘perception is empty.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: de ni / 'di ltar 'du byed stong pa nyid 'du byed stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar 'du byed stong pa nyid 'du byed stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: it is because the emptiness of formative predispositions is empty of the emptiness of formative predispositions.

original: 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed stong pa nyid ma lags; 'du byed stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed stong pa nyid ma lags; 'du byed stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of formative predispositions is not the emptiness of formative predispositions, and emptiness is not apart from the emptiness of formative predispositions.

original: 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness of formative predispositions is emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed stong pa nyid do //
translated: and emptiness is the emptiness of formative predispositions.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: rnam grangs des na; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: For these reasons, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in ‘conditioning is empty.’

original: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not stand in ‘consciousness is empty.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: de ni / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: it is because the emptiness of consciousness is empty of the emptiness of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of consciousness is not the emptiness of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang @529a *//
analyzed: rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang @529a *//
translated: Apart from the emptiness of consciousness

original: stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: there is no emptiness,🔽and apart from the emptiness of consciousness🔽there is no consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Consciousness is emptiness and emptiness is consciousness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam bar shes pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam bar shes pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the emptiness of consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: for these reasons bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in ‘consciousness is empty.’

original: bcom ldan 'das; gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das; gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: “Furthermore, Blessed One, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in ‘form is signless.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ni / 'di ltar gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ni / 'di ltar gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: Blessed One,🔽it is because the signlessness of form is empty of the signlessness of form.

original: gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the signlessness of form is not the signlessness of form.

original: gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: emptiness does not exist apart from the signlessness of form.

original: gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid; stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid; stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid do //
translated: The signlessness of form is emptiness, and emptiness is the signlessness of form.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for that reason

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: bodhisattva mahāsattvas who practice the perfection of wisdom should not stand in the notion that form is signless.

original: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor ba mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi @529b bgyi ste; de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor ba mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi @529b bgyi ste; de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom they should not stand in the notion that feeling is signless. And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: de ni / 'di ltar tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: it is because the signlessness of feeling is empty of the signlessness of feeling.

original: tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the signlessness of feeling is not the signlessness of feeling.

analyzed: tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the signlessness of feeling, there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid do //
translated: The signlessness of feeling is emptiness, and emptiness is the signlessness of feeling.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for these reasons

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe tshor ba mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not abide in the notion that ‘feeling is signless.’

analyzed: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du shes mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not abide in the notion that ‘perception is signless.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste /

analyzed: 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags /

analyzed: 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the absence of the causal signs of perceptions, there is no emptiness.🔽The absence of the causal signs of perceptions is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the absence of the causal signs of perceptions.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du shes mtshan ma med @530a *//
translated: bodhisattva mahāsattvas, when practicing the perfection of wisdom, should not stand in ‘perceptions are signless’;

original: do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not stand in ‘perceptions are signless.’

analyzed: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not stand in ‘volitional factors are signless’;

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the absence of marks of conditioning is not the absence of marks of conditioning.

analyzed: 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the absence of marks of conditioning.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid do //
translated: The absence of marks of conditioning is emptiness, and emptiness is the absence of marks of conditioning.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not stand in ‘conditioning is without marks.’

original: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste; de ci'i slad du zhe na /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not stand in ‘consciousness without a sign. ’ And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of ‘consciousness without a sign’ is not ‘consciousness without a sign.’🔽Apart from ‘consciousness without a sign’ there is no emptiness,

analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis @530b te; rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: and ‘consciousness without a sign’ is also empty.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness is also ‘consciousness without a sign.’

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na /
translated: for this reason

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: “When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they should not stand in the idea ‘consciousness is signless. ’

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /

analyzed: gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs smon pa med pa nyid ma lags /

analyzed: gzugs smon pa med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the expanse of reality is not the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from the expanse of reality, there is no emptiness.🔽The expanse of reality itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Emptiness itself is the expanse of reality.

original: bcom ldan @534a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan @534a *//

analyzed: 'das; rnam grangs des na /

translated: “Moreover, Blessed One, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not abide in the expanse of reality.

translated: “Moreover, Blessed One, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not abide in the faultless nature of phenomena.

analyzed: chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags /

analyzed: chos skyon med pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te / chos skyon med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chos skyon med pa nyid do //

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas na /🔽de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi /
